info.description:
See our GitHub Page for more documentation.
Post any issues found here.
info.title: Genie REST API

get.summary: Find applications
get.description: Find applications by the submitted criteria.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the application.

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: User who created the application.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the applications to get.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Tags for the cluster.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to start on.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of results per page.

parameters.name: descending
parameters.description: Whether results should be sorted in descending or ascending order. Defaults to descending

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The fields to order the results by. Must not be collection fields. Default is updated.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

post.description: Create an application from the supplied information.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The application to create.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

409.description: An application with the supplied id already exists

delete.summary: Delete all applications
delete.description: Delete all available applications and get them back.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

get.summary: Find an application by id
get.description: Get the application by id if it exists

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to get.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

put.description: Update an application from the supplied information.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to update.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The application information to update.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

delete.summary: Delete an application
delete.description: Delete an application with the supplied id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to delete.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

get.summary: Get the commands this application is associated with
get.description: Get the commands which this application supports.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to get the commands for.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The statuses of the commands to find.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

get.summary: Get the configuration files for an application
get.description: Get the configuration files for the application with the supplied id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to get configurations for.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

post.summary: Add new configuration files to an application
post.description: Add the supplied configuration files to the application with the supplied id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to add configuration to.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The configuration files to add.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

put.summary: Update configuration files for an application
put.description: Replace the existing configuration files for application with given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to update configurations for.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The configuration files to replace existing with.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

delete.summary: Remove all configuration files from an application
delete.description: Remove all the configuration files from the application with given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to delete from.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

get.summary: Get the jars for an application
get.description: Get the jars for the application with the supplied id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to get the jars for.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

post.summary: Add new jar files to an application
post.description: Add the supplied jar files to the applicaiton with the supplied id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to add jar to.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The jar files to add.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

put.summary: Update jar files for an application
put.description: Replace the existing jar files for application with given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to update configurations for.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The jar files to replace existing with.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

delete.summary: Remove all jar files from an application
delete.description: Remove all the jar files from the application with given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to delete from.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

get.summary: Get the tags for a application
get.description: Get the tags for the application with the supplied id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to get tags for.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

post.summary: Add new tags to a application
post.description: Add the supplied tags to the application with the supplied id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to add configuration to.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The tags to add.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

put.description: Replace the existing tags for application with given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to update tags for.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The tags to replace existing with.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

delete.summary: Remove all tags from a application
delete.description: Remove all the tags from the application with given id.  Note that the genie name space tagsprefixed with genie.id and genie.name cannot be deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to delete from.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

delete.summary: Remove a tag from a application
delete.description: Remove the given tag from the application with given id. Note that the genie name space tagsprefixed with genie.id and genie.name cannot be deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the application to delete from.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: The tag to remove.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

get.summary: Find clusters
get.description: Find clusters by the submitted criteria.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the cluster.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the cluster.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Tags for the cluster.

parameters.name: minUpdateTime
parameters.description: Minimum time threshold for cluster update

parameters.name: maxUpdateTime
parameters.description: Maximum time threshold for cluster update

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to start on.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of results per page.

parameters.name: descending
parameters.description: Whether results should be sorted in descending or ascending order. Defaults to descending

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The fields to order the results by. Must not be collection fields. Default is updated.

412.description: If one of status is invalid

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

post.description: Create a cluster from the supplied information.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The cluster to create.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

409.description: A cluster with the supplied id already exists

delete.summary: Delete all clusters
delete.description: Delete all available clusters and get them back.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

get.summary: Find a cluster by id
get.description: Get the cluster by id if it exists

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to get.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

put.description: Update a cluster from the supplied information.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to update.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The cluster information to update with.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

delete.summary: Delete a cluster
delete.description: Delete a cluster with the supplied id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to delete.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

get.summary: Get the commands for a cluster
get.description: Get the commands for the cluster with the supplied id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to get commands for.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

post.summary: Add new commands to a cluster
post.description: Add the supplied commands to the cluster with the supplied id. commands should already have been created.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to add commands to.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The commands to add.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

put.summary: Update the commands for an cluster
put.description: Replace the existing commands for cluster with given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to update commands for.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The commands to replace existing with. Should already be created

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

delete.summary: Remove all commands from an cluster
delete.description: Remove all the commands from the cluster with given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to delete from.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

delete.summary: Remove a command from a cluster
delete.description: Remove the given command from the cluster with given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to delete from.

parameters.name: cmdId
parameters.description: The id of the command to remove.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

get.summary: Get the configuration files for a cluster
get.description: Get the configuration files for the cluster with the supplied id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to get configurations for.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

post.summary: Add new configuration files to a cluster

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

put.summary: Update configuration files for an cluster
put.description: Replace the existing configuration files for cluster with given id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to update configurations for.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The configuration files to replace existing with.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

get.summary: Get the tags for a cluster
get.description: Get the tags for the cluster with the supplied id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to get tags for.

post.summary: Add new tags to a cluster
post.description: Add the supplied tags to the cluster with the supplied id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to add configuration to.

parameters.name: body

put.description: Replace the existing tags for cluster with given id.

parameters.name: id

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The tags to replace existing with.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

delete.summary: Remove all tags from a cluster
delete.description: Remove all the tags from the cluster with given id.  Note that the genie name space tagsprefixed with genie.id and genie.name cannot be deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the cluster to delete from.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

delete.summary: Remove a tag from a cluster
delete.description: Remove the given tag from the cluster with given id. Note that the genie name space tagsprefixed with genie.id and genie.name cannot be deleted.

get.summary: Find commands

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the command.

parameters.description: User who created the command.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The statuses of the commands to find.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Tags for the cluster.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to start on.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of results per page.

parameters.description: Whether results should be sorted in descending or ascending order. Defaults to descending

parameters.description: The fields to order the results by. Must not be collection fields. Default is updated.

get.summary: Find jobs
get.description: Find jobs by the submitted criteria.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the job.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the job.

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: Name of the user who submitted the job.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Statuses of the jobs to fetch.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Tags for the job.

parameters.name: executionClusterName
parameters.description: Name of the cluster on which the job ran.

parameters.name: executionClusterId
parameters.description: Id of the cluster on which the job ran.

parameters.name: commandName
parameters.description: The page to start on.

parameters.name: commandId
parameters.description: Id of the cluster on which the job ran.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to start on.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of results per page.

parameters.name: descending
parameters.description: Whether results should be sorted in descending or ascending order. Defaults to descending

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The fields to order the results by. Must not be collection fields. Default is updated.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

post.description: Submit a new job to run to genie

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Job object to run.

500.description: Genie Server Error due to Unknown Exception

parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Id of the job.

parameters.description: Id of the job to get tags for.

id.description: The unique id of this resource. If one is not provided it is created internally

created.description: When this resource was created. Set automatically by system

updated.description: When this resource was last updated. Set automatically by system

executable.description: Location of the executable for this command

envPropFile.description: Location of a property file which will be downloaded and sourced before command execution

jobType.description: Job type of the command. eg: hive, pig , hadoop etc

configs.description: Locations of all the configuration files needed for this command which will be downloaded

tags.description: All the tags associated with this command

Command.description: An entity for managing a Command in the Genie system.

FileAttachment.description: An attachment for use with a job.

id.description: The unique id of this resource. If one is not provided it is created internally

created.description: When this resource was created. Set automatically by system

updated.description: When this resource was last updated. Set automatically by system

clusterType.description: The type of the cluster to use to figure out the job manager for this cluster. e.g.: yarn, presto, mesos etc. The mapping to a JobManager will be specified using the property: com.netflix.genie.server.job.manager.<clusterType>.impl

configs.description: All the configuration files needed for this cluster which will be downloaded pre-use

tags.description: The tags associated with this cluster

Cluster.description: An entity for managing a cluster in the Genie system.

id.description: The unique id of this resource. If one is not provided it is created internally

created.description: When this resource was created. Set automatically by system

updated.description: When this resource was last updated. Set automatically by system

commandArgs.description: Command line arguments for the job.

group.description: Group name of the user who submitted this job

envPropFile.description: Path to a shell file which is sourced before job is run where properties can be set

clusterCriterias.description: List of criteria containing tags to use to pick a cluster to run this job, evaluated in order

commandCriteria.description: List of criteria containing tags to use to pick a command to run this job

fileDependencies.description: Dependent files for this job to run. Will be downloaded from s3/hdfs before job starts

attachments.description: Attachments sent as a part of job request. Can be used as command line arguments

disableLogArchival.description: Boolean variable to decide whether job should be archived after it finishes defaults to true

email.description: Email address to send notifications to on job completion

tags.description: Any tags a user wants to add to the job to help with discovery of job later

executionClusterName.description: Name of the cluster where the job is running or was run. Set automatically by system

executionClusterId.description: Id of the cluster where the job is running or was run. Set automatically by system

applicationName.description: Name of the application that this job is using to run or ran with. Set automatically by system

applicationId.description: Id of the application that this job is using to run or ran with. Set automatically by system

commandName.description: Name of the command that this job is using to run or ran with. Set automatically by system

commandId.description: Id of the command that this job is using to run or ran with. Set automatically by system

processHandle.description: The process handle. Set by system

status.description: The current status of the job. Set automatically by system

statusMsg.description: A status message about the job. Set automatically by system

started.description: The start time of the job. Set automatically by system

finished.description: The end time of the job. Initialized at 0. Set automatically by system

clientHost.description: The hostname of the client submitting the job. Set automatically by system

hostName.description: The genie host where the job is being run or was run. Set automatically by system

killURI.description: The URI to use to kill the job. Set automatically by system

outputURI.description: The URI where to find job output. Set automatically by system

exitCode.description: The exit code of the job. Set automatically by system

forwarded.description: Whether this job was forwarded or not. Set automatically by system

archiveLocation.description: Where the logs were archived. Set automatically by system

Job.description: An entity for submitting and monitoring a job in Genie.

tags.description: The tags which are ANDed together to select a viable cluster for the job

ClusterCriteria.description: A set of cluster criteria for a job.

id.description: The unique id of this resource. If one is not provided it is created internally

created.description: When this resource was created. Set automatically by system

updated.description: When this resource was last updated. Set automatically by system

status.description: The current status of this application

envPropFile.description: A file location with environment variables or other settings which will be downloaded and sourced before application used

configs.description: All the configuration files needed for this application which will be downloaded pre-use

jars.description: Any jars needed to run this application which will be downloaded pre use

tags.description: The tags associated with this application

Application.description: An entity for managing an application in the Genie system.
